name: The Chase for the Kidnapped Mermaid
name_original: The Chase for the Kidnapped Mermaid
description:
Try to rescue the kidnapped mermaid and fight Crab King in his sand castle. Find the hidden areas and watch out for spiders and crabs.

Navigation

left / right: arrow keys or A and D

jump: SHIFT or SPACE or up or W (which fits best for you)

menu: ESC

You can use your simple gamepad too (NOT in browser).

Game engine

Made with GODOT game engine
